titles.title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to allow airport projects to be eligible to participate in the TIFIA program, and for other purposes.
Transportation Infrastructure Finance and Innovation Act for Airports
Transportation Infrastructure Finance and Innovation Act for Airports
Transportation Infrastructure Finance and Innovation Act for Airports

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Transportation Infrastructure Finance and Innovation Act for Airports
This bill allows certain eligible airport-related projecs to participate in the Transportation Infrastructure Finance and Innovation Act program.
